author: Kristopher Priewe
comment: have used this for a few months on my Moto 360 with no complaints, except I would like new faces added. these are getting a little stale for me. please work on adding more. that's why i paid for the app in the first place.  UPDATE: lowered my original rating because i still have not seen any updated faces. i paid the full amount to have all the faces and have seen nothing. these are great faces and look nice but stick with the basic faces and don't waste your money.

author: Dave S
comment: Very cool watch faces! These are what all faces should strive to be. Simple, elegant, with a little movement to add a nice touch. There is one problem I have found on my moto 360: the time is not centered horizontally on the face; it's off to the right. Fix this, and this is an easy 5 stars!!
title: Awesome!

author: Patti Arthur
comment: Worked great for my smart watch. Try it, the only thing is that there should be a larger amount of new faces.  My friend is into flowers a lot, if you put more of those I know she will download it..     Thank you.
title: P. Arthur

author: Dorothy Arnold
comment: I have a ladies Huawei and it works beautifully! I chose Moto 360 as the watch type. While time isn't centered, I'm not sure it was intended to be as it would block the image? Thanks for such a lovely app. I'd love to see more themes from you such as a hummingbird in flight ;)

author: Tamara Ford
comment: First, this app does indeed work with the Huawei watch. Which is a good thing. It's set to the Moto 360 setting since Huawei isn't an option. Second, I purchase premium and got no additional content. The content is exactly the same as the free version. I feel like I got played for that. Where are the fall and winter themes?
title: Huawei... I got played buying premium.. Got NOTHING for it.

author: Ty Thompson
comment: The faces they have are nice but I wish I would have read the reviews before trying to upgrade to "premium". You don't get anything different than the free version . This developer should be confronted by Google about this!

author: Robert Rrtherfurd
comment: At the risk of possibly not knowing what I'm doing! I can't give anything more than the one. I've playing around (wasted) longer than I care to. Any watch I've picked, costs me a small fortune. And this, I must assume, is what you call free? Give me a break. Although, I've not had the chance to view it o my home screen, it does look very cool
title: Robbè LG G4

author: Laurie Montgomery
comment: It worked ok until I purchased the Galaxy s8plus now it will not work with my watch. I'm so sad. This was my favorite watchface

author: Christina Rodrigues
comment: the icons on the bottom are slanted to the right and partially covered by the bottom lip. I tried playing around with the settings to see if I could somehow fix it, to no avail. :/
title: Moto360. I love the idea for this app but..

author: Tu Anh Vo
comment: I paid for one of the unlocked faces and couldn't get it on my watch due to a glitch.  Horrible.
title: Paid for but doesn't work

author: S. Bryant
comment: On my huawei watch the digital time is not centered like in the app pictures and when choosing what type of watch I own in the app huawei is not listed.. Am I missing something.. especially when the app mentions a huawei fix?..  Otherwise the animations are beautiful
title: I like the app but...

author: Iain McLoughlin
comment: Nice choice of faces but I made a donation through the HD app but this does not give access to premium faces via any other app. Disappointed

author: Leah G
comment: The face is beautiful, but what's annoying me is that it won't read the correct weather and I can't change it. Is there a fix for this or will there be an update?
title: Very pretty but weather is wrong

author: Rere Riley
comment: On my LG Urbane can't see left portion of date. The weather on bottom left is also cut off. Cuts of time on top right.
title: Beautiful animation

author: Kimberly Oliver
comment: Really enjoyed this app.  Went to buy the premium, however app creator is greedy and you can't purchase just the premium without buying him "inspirational food or drinks"
title: Wanted the Premium BUT....

author: Laura Luwho
comment: The only problem is that it glitches just a bit at the end. Otherwise it performs just as expected.
title: Beautiful watch face

author: KCG B
comment: faces are cool however doesn't work. bluetooth is connected & notifications working. But this app doesn't work. sorry. I'm using a android panadoo smart watch.
title: didn't push faces to watch

author: Joanne Carrigan
comment: Just paid for the up grade and got nothing else so sad
title: Not happy

author: E Novotny
comment: I love the animations, they're beautiful. More importantly, I really like the day, date, and weather info. My notifications cover the weather so I can always see the time and date. Excellent design.
title: Pretty and functional

author: frank brenen
comment: Does not push watch face to device. Doesn't even install on watch. Install/uninstall x 2, no joy.  Bug report sent..uninstall..vaporware unfortunately. Cheers
title: HTC M8/Moto 360 1st gen..Nothing!

author: Arash Zamani
comment: It is a nice app, I paid for it and I don't regret it,  although there was a promise of new themes every week and it never happened.  Hope the developer ads some new themes or add a upload your own file option.

author: Lisa Saunders
comment: So wish more than anything for some winter and Christmas faces. Maybe next year
title: Holiday/winter

author: paul richman
comment: One of the very best. BRAVO!  All the faces look great on my Tag Heuer Connected. I'd give you 10 stars if I could.
title: Great watch face app

author: Kenneth Dalbosco
comment: Works nicely, hope after buyin premium more faces come.. without more charges! Very nice hd animated picture's. Great job!
title: Life's a garden, I dig it!

author: edward tatem
comment: Still a good buy
title: I like it sorry it's not to many free faces

author: Fredrich A
comment: Looks great on mine.  All faces in the pack were free.  Be sure android wear is set to animated watch faces after hitting push to watch.
title: Works on lg urbane

author: Waqas Ullah
comment: Works fine on the Sony SW3.  Very beautiful watch face.  I've only got the free ones and love them (3/23 faces).  I'd quite like one with digital plus analogue display on the same face.
title: Beautiful watch faces

author: Sarah York
comment: I paid for the premium and I didn't get any extra faces absolutely nothing changed
title: Not happy

author: Kimberly Kise
comment: Keep getting an error "Animated watch face stopped working". I have installed and uninstalled 3 times, restarted watch and it will not work
title: Animated watch faces

author: Dalip Kumar
comment: After installing app on phone i m unable to fatch this on my samsung gear 2 watch.. no channel available to connect.
title: Help

author: DeeJay RyderDie
comment: Not working please sony smart watch 3 paid 1.09 to you product doesn't work
title: I'm not liking this

author: Vickie Osborne
comment: I have the Asus zenwatch 2. I absolutely love the animated backgrounds. I have not noticed any change in my battery usage with this app! I would love a few new flower blooms... or maybe randomize them!
title: Love it!

author: John VanDurme
comment: Did everything right but won't push animated faces from my Note 3 to moto 360

author: Damian Derby
comment: Got help pretty fast fixed my issues....was very specific... beautiful watchfaces great on always on setting and gentle on battery
title: Update pretty satisfied

author: kingsle for real jackson
comment: Beautifully rendered animations really captures attention. Wished there were animations of animals like fish in aquariums, horses, etc.  Really nice interface. Good job!
title: Needs animal themes

author: Tushal Bhadang
comment: Illustration shoes Huawei watch but cannot select from the set up option... Useless!
title: Lousy

author: Lisa Anthony
comment: I purchased the Samsung Gear V700 and I am unable to sync, is this compatible? How do I get my phone to sync with my watch? Thank you!
title: Not working...help!

author: Frank Robinson
comment: I'm going to try for couple more weeks if it holds up next month I shall be getting the premium
title: So cool

author: Yusuf Qureshi
comment: Beautiful themes,  I cannot be anything better then these themes for my watch
title: Beautiful themes,  I cannot be anything better then these themes for my watch

comment: I absolutely love these watch faces. The animations are really beautiful and clear on the Moto 360. Great selections to choose from too. Highly recommend.
title: Way better than I thought!
